languages.text: {n}Скрежет некрона отдаленно напоминает то ли хохот, то ли рыдание. {/n} "Рже не даровано ведать, как гибнет благородный металл! Разрушивший разрушится. Проклятый сеет заразу. Великие сражаются — ничтожные падут!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Скрежет некрона отдаленно напоминает хохот. {/n} "Ржа вопрошает, отчего гибнет покрытый ею металл. Разрушивший разрушится. Проклятый сеет заразу. Великие сражаются — ничтожные падут".

languages.text: {n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles laughter, or perhaps sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of witnessing noble metal perish! The destroyer shall be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty do battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"
languages.original_text: {n}Скрежет некрона отдаленно напоминает то ли хохот, то ли рыдание. {/n} "Рже не даровано ведать, как гибнет благородный металл! Разрушивший разрушится. Проклятый сеет заразу. Великие сражаются — ничтожные падут!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles either laughter or sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of seeing noble metal perish! The destroyer will be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty go to battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"

{n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles either laughter or sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of seeing noble metal perish! The destroyer will be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty go to battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"

{n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles either laughter or sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of witnessing noble metal perish! The destroyer will be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"

{n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles either laughter or sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of witnessing noble metal perish! The destroyer will be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"

{n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles laughter, or perhaps sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of witnessing noble metal perish! The destroyer shall be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty do battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"

{n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles laughter, or perhaps sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of witnessing noble metal perish! The destroyer shall be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty do battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"

languages.text: {n}El chirrido del Necrón guarda un parecido lejano con el llanto o la risa, no sabes cuál. {/n} «¡El óxido no merece el privilegio de ver morir el noble metal! El destructor será destruido. El ser maldito siembra la enfermedad. Los grandes y los poderosos luchan, ¡y los débiles y los mezquinos caerán!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles laughter, or perhaps sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of witnessing noble metal perish! The destroyer shall be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty do battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El chirrido del necrón guarda un parecido lejano con el llanto o la risa, no sabes cuál. {/n} «¡El óxido no merece el privilegio de ver morir el noble metal! El destructor será destruido. El ser maldito siembra la enfermedad. Los grandes y los poderosos luchan, ¡y los débiles y los mezquinos caerán!».

languages.text: {n}Les crissements du Nécron évoquent à la fois des pleurs et des éclats de rire. {/n} « La rouille n'a pas le privilège de voir le noble métal périr ! {mf|Le destructeur|La destructrice} sera à son tour {mf|détruit|détruite}. {mf|Le damné|La damnée} répand la maladie. Tandis que les grands et puissants combattent, les âmes indignes et insignifiantes tomberont ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles laughter, or perhaps sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of witnessing noble metal perish! The destroyer shall be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty do battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les crissements du Nécron évoquent à la fois des pleurs et des éclats de rire. {/n} « La rouille n'a pas le privilège de voir le noble métal périr ! {mf|Le destructeur|La destructrice} sera à son tour {mf|détruit|détruite}. {mf|Le damné|La damnée} répand la maladie. Tandis que les grands et puissants combattent, les âmes indignes et insignifiantes tomberont ! »

languages.text: {n}ネクロンの耳をつんざく声は、どこか笑いにもすすり泣きにも聞こえた。{/n}「錆は高貴なる金属の滅びを見届けることはない！デストロイヤーは破壊される。呪われし者は病の種を蒔く。偉大にして強大な戦い…些細で取るに足らぬ者は滅びる！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles laughter, or perhaps sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of witnessing noble metal perish! The destroyer shall be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty do battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ネクロンの耳をつんざく声は、どこか笑いにもすすり泣きにも聞こえた。{/n}「錆は高貴なる金属の滅びを見届けることはない！デストロイヤーは破壊される。呪われし者は病の種を蒔く。偉大にして強大な戦いーー些細で取るに足らぬ者は滅びる！」

languages.text: {n}太空死灵的声音听起来既像是大笑，又像是啜泣。{/n}“锈渍无权目睹高贵的金属如何毁灭！毁灭者终将遭到毁灭。被诅咒者正在散播疾病。在这场伟大、光荣的战斗中，渺小无用之人注定灭亡！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles laughter, or perhaps sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of witnessing noble metal perish! The destroyer shall be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty do battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}太空死灵的声音听起来既像是大笑，又像是啜泣。{/n}“锈渍无权目睹高贵的金属如何毁灭！毁灭者终将遭到毁灭。被诅咒者正在散播疾病。在这场伟大、光荣的战斗中，渺小无用之人注定灭亡！”

languages.text: {n}Das Kreischen des Necrons erinnert entfernt an Lachen, oder vielleicht an Schluchzen. {/n} "Rost hat nicht das Privileg, edlem Metall beim Sterben zuzusehen! Der Zerstörer wird zerstört. Der Verfluchte sät Krankheit. Die Großen und Mächtigen kämpfen — die Kleinlichen und Wertlosen werden fallen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles laughter, or perhaps sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of witnessing noble metal perish! The destroyer shall be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty do battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Kreischen des Necrons erinnert entfernt entweder an Lachen oder an Schluchzen. {/n} "Rost hat nicht das Privileg, edlem Metall beim Sterben zuzusehen! Der Zerstörer wird zerstört. Der Verfluchte sät Krankheit. Die große und mächtige Schlacht — die Kleinlichen und Wertlosen werden fallen!"

languages.text: {n}Nekron'un feryatları, hem gülüşü hem de hıçkırığı andırıyor.{/n} "Pas, asil metalin yok oluşuna şahit olma imtiyazına sahip değildir! Yok edici yok edilecek. Lanetli varlık, felaketin habercisi. Ulu ve kudretli olan savaşır, zavallı ve işe yaramaz olan bertaraf olur!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Necron's screeching distantly resembles laughter, or perhaps sobs. {/n} "Rust does not have the privilege of witnessing noble metal perish! The destroyer shall be destroyed. The accursed one is sowing disease. The great and mighty do battle — the petty and worthless shall fall!"
